column4: right, so I have done a "useradd httpd" on a Ubuntu 10.04 server, then went to SSH in and I get "Could not chdir to home directory /home/httpd: No such file or directory", what have I done wrong?
does that director exist? Sounds like it doesn't.
doesnt /home/[user] get created as part of the useradd process?
Usually, but sometimes not. Make the directory again if it isn't there, check that the home directory is that as well.
